page.title: 09Farming in Twyford
page.content: There are a total of 16 farm houses with assorted buildings and land ajoining in the block.9 of the farms include arable land,the rest are all grassland.5 farms milk but their stock has been cut by the government due to Common Market regulations.10 farms keep breeding sheep and 12 keep store cattle.3 breed pigs and 2 keep chickens in deep litter for egg marketing, although most keep a few free-range chickens for their own egg needs.One farm breeds race horses.The growing of cereal crops is increasing apart from the wetter land by the river.Cereal crops can be seen in all parts of the block. All the farms are family farms. There is very little outside farm labour just some contract labour for shearing and harvest.
